content: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/62924 seems to be a reasonably popular (and old) tracking issue; what's needed to get it unstuck?

that's very weird; that issue is used as a tracking issue for the map_first_last feature gate, but that issue isn't tagged as a tracking issue at all, nor does it track the status of that feature gate.
Okay, does that mean it will come up in a libs meeting at some point?
Will try to write a summary of open questions to hopefully get some attention on it
